languages.text: "Побьем врага их же приемом. Организуйте в зараженных секторах катаклизмы, которые погубят их с гарантией".
"We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."
languages.original_text: "Побьем врага их же приемом. Организуйте в зараженных секторах катаклизмы, которые погубят их с гарантией".

traits.locale_text: "We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise the cataclysms inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."
"We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise the cataclysms inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."
"We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."
"We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."
"We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."
"We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."

languages.text: “我们应该以其人之道，还治其人之身。我们可以在受感染的区域中引发结构坍塌和系统故障，这肯定能把他们全都消灭。”
languages.original_text: "We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."

traits.locale_text: “我们应该以其人之道，还治其人之身。我们可以在受感染的区域中引发结构坍塌和系统故障，这肯定能把他们全都消灭。”

languages.text: «Deberíamos darles a probar su propia medicina. Organizar colapsos y fallos del sistema dentro de los sectores infectados que causen su destrucción».
languages.original_text: "We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."

traits.locale_text: «Deberíamos darles a probar su propia medicina. Organizar colapsos y fallos del sistema dentro de los sectores infectados que causen su destrucción».

languages.text: 「奴らにしっぺ返しを食らわせなければなるまい。感染したセクターの内部で崩壊やシステム障害を引き起こして、それらを確実に破壊するんだ」
languages.original_text: "We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らにしっぺ返しを食らわせなければなるまい。感染したセクターの内部で崩壊やシステム障害を引き起こして、それらを確実に破壊するんだ」

languages.text: « Il faudrait leur faire goûter à leurs propres méthodes... Organiser des effondrements et des défaillances système au sein des secteurs infectés qui les détruiraient à coup sûr. »
languages.original_text: "We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."

traits.locale_text: « Il faudrait leur faire goûter à leurs propres méthodes... Organiser des effondrements et des défaillances système au sein des secteurs infectés qui les détruiraient à coup sûr. »

languages.text: "Wir sollten sie von ihrer eigenen Medizin kosten lassen. In den infizierten Systemen für Zusammenbrüche und Systemausfälle sorgen, durch die sie garantiert vernichtet werden."
languages.original_text: "We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten sie von ihrer eigenen Medizin kosten lassen. In den infizierten Systemen für Zusammenbrüche und Systemausfälle sorgen, durch die sie garantiert vernichtet werden."

languages.text: "Onlarla anladıkları dilden konuşmalıyız. Etkilenen sektörlerin içinde onları muhakkak yok edecek yıkımlar ve sistem hataları gerçekleştirin."
languages.original_text: "We should give them a taste of their own medicine. Organise collapses and system failures inside the infected sectors that are guaranteed to destroy them."
